text: Nza phorgap guigira Zisas khothɨgi guma, Aporos, ana kameŋ khare. Gu mba guigira Zisas khothɨgi gumgi nden han ndaim, gu mbe phorgɨp nden han nan zav khaŋ tɨgɨp ana sasarigim, ana ntigem guigira naangeŋ thagi. Ana zumgum nduara wo khɨkhɨm mbarararga, ana mbar naanga tugar vhuuŋ, ana mbar naanga.
